00034 class VMAgent {
00035 
00039         private $vmAPI;     // ApiMan
00040         private $vmAuth;    // Auth (abstract)
00041         private $vmStorage; // VMSotrage (abstract)
00042         private $vmList;        // Voicemail's Folders list
00043         
00044         private $vmConfFile; // path to voicemail.conf file (default : /etc/asterisk/)
00045         private $vmSpoolDir; // path to voicemail spool folder (default : /var/spool/asterisk/voicemail/)
00046         
00052         public function __construct($login, $pass, $context) {
00053                 $this->vmAPI = new VMApiMan(); // ApiMan
00054                 $this->autoDetectVoicemailFile();
00055                 $this->autoAuthentication($login, $pass, $context);
00056                 $this->checkStorage($login, $pass, $context);
00057         }
00058         
00062         public function __destruct() {
00063                 
00064         }
00065         
00071         private function autoDetectVoicemailFile() {
00072                 $whereis = exec("whereis asterisk | cut -d':' -f2");
00073                 $whereis = trim($whereis);
00074                 $whereis = preg_replace("/\s{2,}/", " ", $whereis); // deletes spaces to one
00075                 $tab_whereis = explode(" ", $whereis);
00076                 foreach($tab_whereis as $val) {
00077                         $findSpool = exec("find ". $val ." -nowarn -name \"asterisk.conf\" -print");
00078                         if( $findSpool != "" ) {
00079                                 $grep = exec("sudo grep astspooldir ". $findSpool ." | cut -d'>' -f2");
00080                                 if( $grep != "" ) {
00081                                         $this->vmSpoolDir = trim($grep) ."/voicemail";
00082                                 }
00083                         }
00084                         $findConf = exec("find ". $val ." -nowarn -name \"voicemail.conf\" -print");
00085                         if( $findConf != "" ) {
00086                                 $this->vmConfFile = $findConf;
00087                         }
00088                 }
00089                 echo "<command>";
00090                 echo "<grep>vmSpoolDir : >$this->vmSpoolDir</grep>";
00091                 echo "<grep>vmConfFile : >$this->vmConfFile</grep>";
00092                 echo "</command>";
00093         }
00094         
00101         private function autoAuthentication($login, $pass, $context) {
00102                 exec("sudo -i");
00103                 $fd = @fopen($this->vmConfFile, "r");
00104                 if( !$fd ) {
00105                         echo "<error>";
00106                         echo "Could not open the VOICEMAIL_CONF file : $this->vmConfFile"; 
00107                         echo "</error>";
00108                         return FALSE;
00109                 }
00110                 $inDBpattern = '/^\s*searchcontexts=yes/';
00111                 $authDB = FALSE;
00112                 while( ! feof($fd) ) {
00113                         $buf = fgets($fd, 4096);
00114                         $line = trim($buf);
00115                         if( preg_match($inDBpattern, $line) ) {
00116                                 $authDB = TRUE;
00117                         }
00118                 }
00119                 fclose($fd);
00120                 if( $authDB ) {
00121                         $this->vmAuth = new VMAuthDB();// $login, $pass, $context );
00122                 } else {
00123                         $this->vmAuth = new VMAuthFile($login, $pass, $context);
00124                 }
00125         }
00126         
00133         private function checkStorage($login, $pass, $context) {
00134                 $fd = @fopen($this->vmConfFile, "r");
00135                 if( !$fd ) {
00136                         echo "<error>";
00137                         echo "Could not open the VOICEMAIL_CONF file : $this->vmConfFile";
00138                         echo "</error>";
00139                         return FALSE;
00140                 }
00141                 
00142                 $inODBCpattern = array( "/^\s*odbcstorage=(.*)/" => "",
00143                                                                 "/^\s*odbctable=(.*)/" => "" );
00144                 $inIMAPpattern = array( "/^\s*imapserver=(.*)/" => "",
00145                                                                 "/^\s*imapport=(.*)/" => "",
00146                                                                 "/^\s*authuser=(.*)/" => "",
00147                                                                 "/^\s*authpassword=(.*)/" => "",
00148                                                                 "/^\s*imapfolder=(.*)/" => "" );
00149                 $authODBC = FALSE;
00150                 $authIMAP = FALSE;
00151                 while( ! feof($fd) ) {
00152                         $buf = fgets($fd, 4096);
00153                         $line = trim($buf);
00154                         foreach( $inODBCpattern as $key => $val ) {
00155                                 if( preg_match($key, $line, $matches) ) {
00156                                         $inODBCpattern[$key] = $matches[1];
00157                                 }
00158                         }
00159                         foreach( $inIMAPpattern as $key => $val ) {
00160                                 if( preg_match($key, $line, $matches) ) {
00161                                         $inODBCpattern[$key] = $matches[1];
00162                                 }
00163                         }
00164                 }
00165                 fclose($fd);
00166                 $inODBC = TRUE;
00167                 $inIMAP = TRUE;
00168                 foreach( $inODBCpattern as $key => $val ) {
00169                                 if( empty($val) ) {
00170                                 $inODBC = FALSE;
00171                         }
00172                 }
00173                 foreach( $inIMAPpattern as $key => $val ) {
00174                         if( empty($val) ) {
00175                                 $inIMAP = FALSE;
00176                         }
00177                 }
00178                 if( $inODBC ) {
00179                         $this->vmAuth = new VMStorageODBC();// $login, $pass, $context );
00180                 } else if( $inIMAP ) {
00181                         $this->vmAuth = new VMStorageIMAP($login, $pass, $context);
00182                 } else {
00183                         $this->vmStorage = new VMStorageFile($this->vmSpoolDir ."/". $context ."/". $login);
00184                 }
00185         }
00186         
00191         public function getVMList() {
00192                 return $this->vmStorage->getLstFolders();
00193         }
00194         
00200         public function getVMFByName($name) {
00201                 foreach( $this->vmStorage->getLstFolders() as $vmf ) {
00202                         if( strcmp($vmf->getName(), $name) == 0 ) {
00203                                 return $vmf;
00204                         }
00205                 }
00206         }
00207         
00214         public function getVMByName($fol, $name) {
00215                 return $this->getVMFByName($fol)->getVMByName($name);
00216         }
00217         
00224         public function getVMAt($num) {
00225                 if( $num >= 0 && $num < count($this->vmList) ) {
00226                         return $this->vmList[$num];
00227                 } else {
00228                         return -1;
00229                 }
00230         }
00231 
00239         public function login($login, $pass, $context="default") {
00240                 $this->vmAuth->setLogin($login);
00241                 $this->vmAuth->setPass($pass);
00242                 $this->vmAuth->setContext($context);
00243                 if( $this->vmAuth->login() ) {
00244                         return TRUE;
00245                 } else {
00246                         return FALSE;
00247                 }
00248         }
00249         
00254         public function logout() {
00255                 return $this->vmAuth->logoff();
00256         }
00257         
00261         public function load() {
00262                 $this->vmStorage->load();
00263         }
00264         
00271         public function getSound($folder, $voicemail) {
00272                 return $this->vmStorage->getSound($folder, $voicemail);
00273         }

00282         public function rename($folderName, $oldVMName, $newVMName) {
00283                 return $this->vmStorage->rename($folderName, $oldVMName, $newVMName);
00284         }
00285         
00292         public function deleteFolder($folder) {

00302         public function delete($folder, $vmName) {
